# Antigravity AI - Full LLMs Usage Documentation

## Introduction
Antigravity AI (https://antigravityai.online) is an autonomous AI-powered IDE that revolutionizes software development by automating the entire development lifecycle. This comprehensive document provides detailed information about AI models, technologies, services, and integration methods used by Antigravity AI.

## Platform Pages and Documentation

- [Home](https://antigravityai.online): Main platform homepage and product overview
- [Privacy Policy](https://antigravityai.online/privacy.html): Privacy policy and data handling practices
- [Terms of Service](https://antigravityai.online/terms.html): Service terms and conditions
- [LLMs Documentation](https://antigravityai.online/llms.txt): Brief AI usage documentation

## Platform Overview
Antigravity AI is a complete autonomous development platform that leverages advanced AI technology to:
- Understand natural language project requirements
- Generate complete application code automatically
- Create software architecture and design patterns
- Write and execute automated tests
- Deploy applications to production
- Maintain and optimize code continuously

## AI Models and Services

### Primary AI Model
**Model:** Google Gemini 3 Pro
- **Provider:** Google
- **Purpose:** Autonomous software development, code generation, and project planning
- **API Integration:** Google Gemini API
- **Capabilities:**
  - Understand complex project requirements from natural language
  - Generate production-ready code across multiple programming languages
  - Design software architecture and system components
  - Create comprehensive test suites
  - Debug and optimize existing code
  - Generate technical documentation
- **Usage Patterns:**
  - User describes project requirements in natural language
  - AI creates detailed technical specifications and development plans
  - Autonomous agents generate code, tests, and documentation
  - Continuous monitoring and optimization of generated applications

### Code Analysis AI
**Model:** Google Gemini 3 Pro
- **Provider:** Google
- **Purpose:** Code review, optimization, and bug detection
- **Capabilities:**
  - Analyze code quality and performance
  - Detect security vulnerabilities and bugs
  - Suggest optimizations and refactoring
  - Ensure code follows best practices
  - Generate code documentation

## Development Process

### Autonomous Development Workflow
1. **Requirements Analysis:** User provides project description in natural language
2. **Planning:** AI creates technical specifications and development roadmap
3. **Architecture Design:** AI designs system architecture and component structure
4. **Code Generation:** Autonomous agents write production-ready code
5. **Testing:** AI generates and executes comprehensive test suites
6. **Deployment:** One-click deployment to production environments
7. **Monitoring:** Continuous monitoring and optimization

### Technology Stack
- **Frontend:** HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript
- **AI Engine:** Google Gemini 3 Pro for autonomous development
- **Code Generation:** Multi-language support (JavaScript, Python, Java, Go, Rust, etc.)
- **Cloud Infrastructure:** Vercel for hosting and deployment
- **Version Control:** Git integration for code management
- **CI/CD:** Automated deployment pipelines

## Supported Programming Languages
- JavaScript/TypeScript
- Python
- Java
- Go
- Rust
- C/C++
- Ruby
- PHP
- Swift
- Kotlin
- And more...

## Supported Frameworks
- React, Vue.js, Angular (Frontend)
- Next.js, Nuxt.js (Full-stack)
- Django, Flask, FastAPI (Python)
- Spring Boot (Java)
- Express.js (Node.js)
- And many more...

## Data Handling

### User Data
- Project requirements and specifications are stored securely
- Generated code is associated with user accounts
- User preferences and settings are maintained
- Version history is tracked and stored

### AI Processing
- Requirements are processed by AI models in real-time
- Generated code is validated and tested automatically
- Processing history is maintained for user reference
- All data is encrypted and secure

## Privacy and Security
- All user data is encrypted in transit and at rest
- AI processing complies with data privacy regulations
- Generated code is stored securely on our servers
- Users retain full ownership of their generated code
- Users can delete their projects and data at any time
- Code is scanned for security vulnerabilities

## API Integration and Services
Antigravity AI integrates with multiple services:
- **Google Gemini API:** For autonomous development and code generation
- **Git Services:** Integration with GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket
- **Cloud Platforms:** Vercel, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud
- **CI/CD Tools:** GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins
- **Monitoring Services:** Application performance monitoring
- **Database Services:** PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis support

## Supported Features
- **Natural Language to Code:** Convert project descriptions to working applications
- **Multi-language Support:** Generate code in 15+ programming languages
- **Framework Integration:** Work with popular frameworks and libraries
- **Automated Testing:** Generate and execute comprehensive test suites
- **Code Optimization:** AI-powered performance optimization
- **Bug Detection:** Automatic bug detection and fixes
- **Documentation Generation:** Auto-generate technical documentation
- **Deployment Automation:** One-click deployment to production
- **Version Control:** Git integration with commit history
- **Real-time Collaboration:** Work with AI agents in real-time

## Pricing and Plans
Antigravity AI offers flexible pricing options:
- **Free Tier:** Limited projects for evaluation
- **Professional Plan:** For individual developers
- **Team Plan:** For development teams
- **Enterprise Plan:** Custom solutions for large organizations
- **Pay-as-you-go:** Credit-based pricing model

## Security and Compliance
Antigravity AI is committed to:
- **Data Security:** Enterprise-grade encryption
- **Privacy Protection:** GDPR and data privacy regulation compliance
- **Code Security:** Automated security scanning
- **Transparent AI Usage:** Open documentation of AI models
- **User Rights:** Full control over generated code and data
- **Ethical AI:** Responsible AI development practices

## Performance Metrics
- **Code Generation Speed:** Average 2-5 minutes for complete applications
- **Code Quality:** Production-ready code with best practices
- **Test Coverage:** Automatic generation of 80%+ test coverage
- **Deployment Time:** One-click deployment in under 5 minutes
- **Supported Languages:** 15+ programming languages
- **Framework Support:** 50+ popular frameworks

## Use Cases
- **Rapid Prototyping:** Build MVPs in minutes
- **Full-stack Applications:** Generate complete web applications
- **API Development:** Create RESTful and GraphQL APIs
- **Mobile Apps:** Generate mobile application backends
- **Microservices:** Build microservice architectures
- **Data Processing:** Create data pipelines and ETL jobs
